title: cmd/go: TestOpenLanManServer now runs as TestOpenLanManServer-2
body:
From our builder http://build.golang.org/log/b777dbdb4f736aafe2eacbccee3c499bf7729625

--- FAIL: TestOpenLanManServer-2 (0.00s)
	mgr_test.go:23: SCM connection failed: Access is denied.
FAIL
FAIL	golang.org/x/sys/windows/svc/mgr	0.043s

(reported as issue #11156)

Test that used to run as TestOpenLanManServer now is running as TestOpenLanManServer-2. Perhaps this is the reason for test failure (maybe not). Is that intentional change with our tests? Is that something we need to document somewhere? Perhaps something else to do here.

Alex
